hero.title: LouRock
hero.subtitle: The Sound of Southern France
hero.description: Connecting talented bands from Montpellier & Occitanie with venues across the region

bands.title: Our Featured Bands

dakota.name: Dakota Dreamers
dakota.description: Bringing the spirit of the American West to Southern France with authentic country performances.

kills.name: Tribute Band The Kills
kills.description: A powerful tribute to one of indie's most iconic duos, capturing their raw energy and signature sound.

mathieu.name: Mathieu Schmidt
mathieu.description: Intimate performances blending folk, indie, and Mediterranean influences into a unique musical journey.

espanters.name: Les Espanters
espanters.description: Explosive Mediterranean madness fusing electric guitar with traditional oud, creating a unique nomadic desert-mountain soundscape.

bands.epkNote: Each band provides a complete Electronic Press Kit for professional booking

about.title: About LouRock
about.paragraph1: LouRock is the premier platform connecting talented local bands from Montpellier and the Occitanie region with venues and event organizers across Southern France. We specialize in curating authentic musical experiences that capture the unique cultural blend of our region.
about.paragraph2: From intimate café concerts to festival performances, our artists bring professional quality and passionate performances to every stage. Each band in our roster offers a complete Electronic Press Kit, making booking seamless and professional.
about.paragraph3: Whether you're organizing a corporate event, planning a festival, or booking entertainment for your venue, LouRock connects you with the perfect sound for your audience.

contact.title: Book a Performance
contact.description: Ready to bring exceptional live music to your venue or event? Get in touch with us to discuss your requirements and find the perfect band for your audience.
contact.emailBody:
Hello LouRock Team,

I am interested in booking one of your bands for an upcoming event.

Event Details:
- Date: 
- Venue/Location: 
- Type of Event: 
- Expected Audience Size: 
- Band(s) of Interest: 

Additional Information:


Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Phone Number]

requestBand.title: Didn't find what you were looking for?
requestBand.description: We're always expanding our roster. Let us know what type of band you need and we'll help you find the perfect match for your event.
requestBand.emailBody:
Hello LouRock Team,

I'm looking for a specific type of band that I didn't see in your current roster.

Band/Music Style I'm Looking For:


Event Details:
- Date: 
- Venue/Location: 
- Type of Event: 
- Expected Audience Size: 

Additional Requirements:


Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Phone Number]
